snippet: A federal judge ruled Thursday that California's treatment of mentally ill inmates violates constitutional safeguards against cruel and unusual punishment through excessive use of pepper spray and isolation....

headline.print_headline: Judge: California Mistreating Mentally Ill Inmates
headline.main: Judge: California Mistreating Mentally Ill Inmates

lead_paragraph: A federal judge ruled Thursday that California's treatment of mentally ill inmates violates constitutional safeguards against cruel and unusual punishment through excessive use of pepper spray and isolation.
